caseTitle: Inspector General of Police, Quetta and another v. Faiz Muhammad and others
tagline: (1) Discussion on Rule 9 (6) of the Balochistan Civil Servants (Appointment, Promotion and Transfer) Rules 2009. (2) The principle of natural justice, due process and Doctrine of vested right. The termination of service through an omnibus order was illegal. (3) No action was taken against the top brass engaged in the recruitment process but the low paid poor employees of downtrodden areas were made the scapegoats. (4) The cancellation of Appointment letter was hit by the doctrine of locus poenitentiae.
